1) Run MSVC command prompt so proper environment is set.

32-bit build
2) Run build.bat to get both debug and release build.

64-bit build
2) From the MSVC prompt run "VC\vcvarsall.bat amd64".
3) Run build64.bat to get both debug and release 64-bit build.


IMPORTANT: ffmpeg library is built separately. Check instructions
in the corresponding folder.
